channel.title: Wont let me run? itemhandler error? wtf?
channel.description:
i was hosting my server and i lef tto go eat dinner and when i got back it was down... wat is happening.. when i complie it has no errors but when i run it gets this and no1 can stay logged on? [code]Azn Server.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28)[/code]
please help..

item.title: Wont let me run? itemhandler error? wtf?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

i was hosting my server and i lef tto go eat dinner and when i got back it was down… wat is happening… when i complie it has no errors but when i run it gets this and no1 can stay logged on?

[code]Azn Server.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:39)
